data.eml:eml: First record of Syntormon from Singapore with the description of a new species (Insecta, Diptera, Dolichopodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grootaert, Patrick, Yang, Ding, Wang, Mengqing (2006): First record of Syntormon from Singapore with the description of a new species (Insecta, Diptera, Dolichopodidae). Zootaxa 1114: 53-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171561
